title: `Status` cannot be used as a header in `#[derive(Responder)]`
body:
**Description**

[The docs about `#[derive(Responder)]` state that](https://rocket.rs/v0.5-rc/guide/responses/#custom-responders):

> Because `ContentType` and `Status` are themselves headers, you can also dynamically set the content-type and status by simply including fields of these types.

**To Reproduce**

```rust
#[derive(rocket::Responder)]
struct ServerError {
    inner: String,
    status: rocket::http::Status,
}
```

**Expected Behavior**

This should compile, and set the status code with `status`, but this does not compile:
```
error[E0277]: the trait bound `rocket::http::Header<'_>: std::convert::From<rocket::http::Status>` is not satisfied
   --> src/main.rs:9:5
    |
9   |     status: rocket::http::Status,
    |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ the trait `std::convert::From<rocket::http::Status>` is not implemented for `rocket::http::Header<'_>`
    |
    = help: the following other types implement trait `std::convert::From<T>`:
              <rocket::http::Header<'static> as std::convert::From<&'a Cookie<'c>>>
              <rocket::http::Header<'static> as std::convert::From<AcceptCharset>>
              <rocket::http::Header<'static> as std::convert::From<AcceptEncoding>>
              <rocket::http::Header<'static> as std::convert::From<AcceptLanguage>>
              <rocket::http::Header<'static> as std::convert::From<AcceptRanges>>
              <rocket::http::Header<'static> as std::convert::From<AccessControlAllowCredentials>>
              <rocket::http::Header<'static> as std::convert::From<AccessControlAllowHeaders>>
              <rocket::http::Header<'static> as std::convert::From<AccessControlAllowMethods>>
            and 39 others
    = note: required for `rocket::http::Status` to implement `Into<rocket::http::Header<'_>>`
note: required by a bound in `rocket::Response::<'r>::set_header`
   --> /home/explorer/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rocket-0.4.11/src/response/response.rs:766:34
    |
766 |     pub fn set_header<'h: 'r, H: Into<Header<'h>>>(&mut self, header: H) -> bool {
    |                                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ required by this bound in `Response::<'r>::set_header`
```

**Additional Context**

First reported on StackOverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/q/75570877/7884305.
